name: fridge clicker
description:
currently in version 1.1

fridge clicker is a very cool fun game that you should 100% totally download. it is about clicking a fridge to earn money, and then using that money  to get more fridges.

fridges = money = more fridges = more money

1.1 notes:

added british fridge and r2-d2 fridge

added golden fridge, win screen and credits

fixed screen size bugs

added support for mac os
